channel.title: How can I make my Server go online if I buy a host?
channel.description:
So I just got my RSPS working with all the features done and its ready to be put online.
Problem, If I was to buy a VPS how can I link it with the Client and Source?
I am using Eclipse.
Thanks.

item.title: How can I make my Server go online if I buy a host?

if something works for someone, don’t judge them on how they do something, it may be stupid to you, but that is the way the world works… everyone has an opinion

item.title: How can I make my Server go online if I buy a host?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Pest, post:5, topic:550086”][quote author=Soull3sss1 link=topic=668997.msg4473771#msg4473771 date=1424576990]
Download No-ip DUC and add a host, and once u get that host yourserver.what.ever.net

you change the client ip to that. and make sure your portforwarded just go to firewall setting advanced settings and add a inbound rule of 43594 or 5555 whatever port and make sure port is same of source as client. and itll connect perfectly fine
[/quote]
no-ip is the dumbest thing ever made. it still goes off your IP, it’s like shortening a link. lmao[/quote]
You sir, don’t know a single thing about what you are talking about.

As I’m too lazy to repeat what’s been said, take a look at the following:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,668508.msg4470993.html#msg4470993
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,668508.msg4471871.html#msg4471871

Also, shortening a link has a huge purpose when it comes to communitys that have a limit in their reply box or etc (I.E, twitter).

OP: Setting up a server on a VPS is exactly like setting it up on your computer, except through remote connection. And you probably don’t need to port forward.
For the client, all you need to do is change the IP to the IP address of the VPS. Only use No-IP if the VPS has a dynamic address (Which I doubt it does).

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my Server go online if I buy a host?

item.title: How can I make my Server go online if I buy a host?
item.dc:creator: @greenmats greenmats
item.description:
@greenmats wrote:

b00mz1029:

You move your server files over to the VPS and host it from there. Super easy. I suggest using dropbox and having all your server files in there so you can just download dropbox on your VPS and have them there.

What about the client, How would one link it to the server.

Thanks.

Read full topic
